name: RockPondMan
description:
Using rocks you must clean your precious pond from the litter that appears.  You must strategically use smaller or larger rocks to move the litter in such a way that the animals in the pond don't eat it and hurt themselves, and that you can move the trash safely to your net to remove it. Be on the look out for secrets around the map as some animals unlock hidden levels for the adventurous. Have fun, and be the rock pond man you always wanted to be!

This game was created for the 2016 Global Game Jam by myself and several others in 48 hours.  The whole project is open source and free to download and to learn from.  

A link to the page can be found here: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/rockpondman
